title: Cape Hatteras National Seashore: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Fourth-graders and their families can visit over 2,000 federal lands for free with this pass.   Cape Hatteras National Seashore has many summer activities designed for kids. Check the calendar for available programs. Every Kid in a Park This initiative allows every fourth-grade student and her or his family to visit over 2,000 federal lands—such as national parks, national forests, and national wildlife refuges—for free! For additional information, and to print off a paper pass, visit everykidinapark.gov.
